lead_paragraph: The Australian actress Cate Blanchett and her husband, Andrew Upton have announced that they will extend their term as joint artistic directors of the Sydney Theater Company.
snippet: The Australian actress Cate Blanchett and her husband, Andrew Upton have announced that they will extend their term as joint artistic directors of the Sydney Theater Company.

headline.main: Blanchett and Upton Extend Term of Sydney Job
headline.print_headline: Blanchett And Upton Extend Term of Sydney Job
